column11: ok to martin edward wright and the former anna edwards. she graduated from eufaula high school in 1942. she married russell goodsell in walters
column14: 1989. she was a member of the first baptist church of collinsville and a member of the eastern star. she is survived by two sons: ryan corley of tulsa and douglas goodsell of collinsville
column15: ok. 2 grandchildren: maryssa corley of phoenix and john corley
column16: serving in the u. s. navy. 1 brother: noel wright of eufaula
column17: ok. she is also survived by several nieces and nephews. visitation will be 9:00 a. m. to 8:00 p. m.
column20: 2015 at the collinsville dolton funeral home. funeral services will be 10:00 a. m. friday
column22: 2015 at the collinsville dolton funeral home chapel with rev. rodney goodsell officiating. interment will follow at the ridgelawn cemetery. services are under the direction of collinsville dolton funeral home. send sympathy card
